name: Deathwinds Maze
description:
Small Game made by Draconimous ( coding in Game Maker Studio 2) and Rainsong (art and animation in Aesprite and Pyxel Edit), For Mislav's Limit Jam. Jam was 60 hours. We both had other time constraints as well
                       Deathwinds Maze is a :
Platformer - A&D to move left and Right W to climb, SPACE to attack.

Coin collection but with a limited amount of space for coins.

Music was free from Itch.io

Sounds were free from Kenney.nl

We ahd a lot of fun making this and We know it buggy but over all we are happy with the outcome in such a short time. Hope you like it!!
